name: Call of Spirits
description:
“Call of Spirits” takes you on an adventure through a magical world of floating islands, whimsical creatures and exciting puzzles. In this 3D Puzzle-Platformer you have the ability to record your actions and jump back and forth between two dimensions to progress.

Plot

A young witch by the name of “Moira” has taken on the task of saving all magic from being wiped out entirely. In order to do this she must solve complex riddles to traverse the islands and save the captured spirit leader from an evil magician's clutches.

The Team

This game was created during our 3rd term at "S4G School for Games" in Berlin.
